text: Ghosted is a 2011 British drama film directed by Craig Viveiros. == Cast == * John Lynch as Jack * David Schofield as Donner * Martin Compston as Paul * Craig Parkinson as Clay * Art Malik as Ahmed * Amanda Abbington as Tracy * Hugh Quarshie as Ade == References == == External links == * * Category:2011 drama films Category:British films Category:2011 films Category:English- language films Category:British drama films
title: Ghosted (film)
